alert.note: Alert for Adams; Juneau; Monroe; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 18 at 4:57PM CST until February 18 at 6:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Juneau County in central Wisconsin... Northeastern Vernon County in southwestern Wisconsin... Adams County in central Wisconsin... Southeastern Monroe County in west central Wisconsin... * Until 600 PM CST. * At 456 PM CST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from New Rome to near Cashton, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Extremely poor visibility in heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts greater than 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar and webcams. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes the following highways... Interstate 90/94 between mile markers 46 and 86. Interstate 90 in Wisconsin near mile marker 45. Locations impacted include... Mauston, Friendship, New Lisbon, Westby, Adams, Elroy, Hillsboro, Cashton, Necedah, Wonewoc, La Farge, Dellwood, New Rome, Glendale, Lemonweir and Big Flats. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.
